name: Paint
description:
Sprinkle even more hues into FigJam and paint your Jams with your brand colors! The default set of swatches includes a set of useful swatches which are not available in FigJam natively such as TRUE RED™, bright blue and pink.


Use your own colors

Get styles from the file: open a Figma file which contains solid color styles and run the “Save Palette” command.


Get colors from selected objects: select color swatches (rectangles or ellipses filled with different colors would do, but you can use anything) and run “Save Palette” command.


Video demo from Figma: https://twitter.com/figmadesign/status/1451669085335396352
